to_address: "Speakup is a screen review system for Linux." <speakup@braille.uwo.ca>
subject: Re: gnu c library 2.6 or latest version for debian
body:
Hi, I am already running etch and have even upgraded to sid.  What else 
should I do to upgrade my c library?
----- Original Message ----- 
From: "Gregory Nowak" 
To: 
Sent: Wednesday, May 30, 2007 3:07 PM
Subject: Re: gnu c library 2.6 or latest version for debian


> -----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
> Hash: SHA1
>
> Before you do anything else, you'll want to upgrade to etch first, and
> then get a copy of the latest and greatest stuff you don't yet have.
>
> Greg
>
>
>
> On Wed, May 30, 2007 at 01:51:56PM -0600, Nick Gawronski wrote:
>> Hi, If I wanted to get the latest gnu c library I think it is version 2.6
>> and I am running sid what command would I type to upgrade and or install
>> this package.  I have installed everything else in tasksel but no 
>> upgrades
>> to the c library were done.  Am I missing something Here?
>>
>>
>> _______________________________________________
>> Speakup mailing list
>> Speakup@braille.uwo.ca
>> http://speech.braille.uwo.ca/mailman/listinfo/speakup
